steps.title: Change the Text
steps.description: Welcome! In this first step, you'll see a working example of our framework. The code is already complete - you just need to change the text from "Hello CIT84" to something else.

steps.title: Create a Component Function
steps.description: Start by creating a simple component function that returns JSX-like objects.

steps.title: Build a Render Function
steps.description: Create a render function that can convert your component objects into DOM elements.

steps.title: Add className Support
steps.description: Enhance your render function to handle the className prop, mapping it to the HTML class attribute.

steps.title: Add Event Listeners
steps.description: Extend your render function to handle event handler props that start with 'on'.

steps.title: Build a Complete Page
steps.description: Congratulations! You've built a working framework. Now let's use it to create a complete page with multiple elements - h1, p, a tags, and more!
